job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pstrongTitlenbspSr Data ScientiststrongppstrongLocation Saint Louis MOstrongppstrong100 RemotestrongppstrongDurationnbspnbsp18 MonthsnbspstrongppstronguJob DescriptionustrongpulliAt Client Companies we are passionate about transforming the lives of pets and the people who love them A key ambition of ours is to deliver newtoworld solutions that give pet owners the confidence and reassurance they are seeking in the decisions they make every day regarding their pets needs We aim to do this by developing digital products and services for pet owners and vets that translate each pets behavior health and nutrition data into current and predictive insights unique to each petliliTo deliver on this ambition we are looking for an exceptional senior data scientist with experience in AI and other MachineLearning ML products The ideal candidate will have a desire to leverage this experience to design build and productionize AIML models that can be used at a global level liliIn this role youll use AIML development strategies while collaborating with pet data acquisition infrastructure and AIUX teams to deliver advanced analytics solutions that transform the lives of pets and the people who love themliulpstronguSummaryustrongppThe Client Companies Global Digital Solutions Group is seeking a dynamic and skilled Senior Data Scientist who will develop reliable Data Science solutions This role is a key member of the dynamic new digital product development groups team responsible for Clients global expansion in smart and connectedpet product development as This position is responsible for the development of Advanced Analytics and AI products that translate a pets data into unique behavior health and nutrition insightsppstronguPrimary ResponsibilitiesustrongpulliTranslate objectives into project plans and lead and manage projects to successful end pointsliliCollaborate with internal and external teams to efficiently acquire labelled training data that can be used to create advanced analytic and AI productsliliExtract prepare clean analyze visualize and explore data using scripting languagesliliFeature Engineering including signal processing of time series sensor data and cleaning and processing of longitudinal health record dataliliBuild and test AI and advanced analytic solutions using standard statistical programming languages eg R PythonliliWork closely with product teams to understand and deploy advanced analytics and AI products directly within devices or cloud environments using containerbased solutionsliliMaintain and monitor performance of models in production and iterate and improve models when necessarynbspliliWork with internalexternal vendors to assess needs aid and resolve problems using excellent problemsolving skills and verbalwritten communication to nontechnical audiencesliulpstronguAdditional ResponsibilitiesustrongpulliPolicy Alignment Conduct all activity in compliance with Good Manufacturing Practices GMP Good Laboratory Practices GLP and all required Company policies and proceduresliliSafety Maintain a safe clean and sanitary work environment Practice safety in the work arealiliQuality Support quality assurance and regulatory compliance of all work performedliliTravel Travel as necessary estimated not to exceed 1520liliAdvocate for and use agile digital product development methodologiesliliActively work to deliver products that meet consumer and business needsliliWork effectively within crossfunctional project teams to achieve excellent resultsliliAdditional duties as assignedliulpstronguSupervisionustrongpulliThis position reports to the lead of AI product developmentliulpstronguJob Qualifications Education Experience and KnowledgeustrongpulliPhD or Masters degree from an accredited collegeuniversity in Computer Science Statistics Mathematics Engineering Physics Chemistry or related fields preferred with at least 7 years of relevant experience in statistics machine learning deep learning andor neural networksliliDeep understanding of and experience with standard machine learning algorithms Random Forest SVM Logistic Regression etc and deep learning algorithms and frameworks CNN LSTM GANs etcliliProficiency in statistical programming languages eg Python R and machine learning libraries and packages Python Scipy Numpy Pandas TensorFlow pyTorch Theano MXNet R tidyverse dplyr randomForest caret glmnet nnetliliExperience as a data scientist on a team that has successfully delivered AIML products from inception to production for internal andor external customersliliDeep experience extracting cleaning preparing and modeling large  complex  segmented data sets and interpret data to identify meaningful insightsliliDemonstrated experience working collaboratively with teams using Agile methodologies and version control repositories to develop deploy and enhance highperforming data science deliverablesliliExperience with cloud computing platforms such as AzureliliPossess a clear grasp of the fundamentals of microservices containers and their orchestrationliliAbility to communicate complex technical concepts clearly through written or oral communicationliulpstronguAdditional DesirednbspQualificationsustrongpulliExperience working with AWS cloudliliExperience in applying deep learning models in the field of health diagnosticsliliExperience with CICD pipelines for AI solutionsliulpp
